news.title: The White House Wants Us to Use Schema for COVID-19 Announcements
news.description: The federal government is encouraging private sector businesses and others to incorporate specific structured data tags to make coronavirus information more visible on search engines.

news.title: Google Reveals How Search Behavior Has Changed During COVID-19 Pandemic
news.description: Search behaviors that have shifted since the coronavirus outbreak include categories such as assembling critical information, adjusting to changes in routines, and care of self and others.

news.title: Google’s New Video Builder Will Help Businesses Create Short YouTube Videos
news.description: Google has launched a new YouTube Video Builder tool, which will assist businesses in creating short YouTube videos by using a set of predefined layouts and media resources.

news.title: How to Leverage Google Discover to Connect With Users: 4 Key Takeaways
news.description: Content creators looking to succeed in their use of Google’s personalized content feed should post mobile-friendly content that is relevant to their most engaged users, among other things.
